EmailTemplate.name: FORGE Web Portal Request Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} Approved {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for requesting access to the FORGE portal.
Access has been approved and you will now be able to view the account information for your Company. If you have any trouble logging in, please try closing your browser, delete your session cookies and try again.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you for your continued business.
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Honeywell FORGE
Honeywell | Aerospace
Email:Fssaccounts@honeywell.com
